text: Philip Masato Takahashi (June 12, 1957 - June 15, 2020) was a Canadian judoka. He represented his native country at the Summer Olympics (1984 and 1988). He twice won a bronze medal at the Pan American Games. He ran Takahashi Dojo in Ottawa, Ontario. He taught Judo, Karate and other forms of martial arts. He also taught both English and Physical Education at Confederation High School (Ottawa). Takahashi died of cancer in Ottawa on June 15, 2020 at the age of 63.Phil Takahashi's obituary ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian school teachers Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Canadian judoka
title: Phil Takahashi
